chinese: 爰采唐矣、沬之鄉矣。云誰之思、美孟姜矣。期我乎桑中、要我乎上宮、送我乎淇之上矣。
english: I am going to gather the dodder,In the fields of Mei.But of whom are my thoughts?Of that beauty, the eldest of the Jiang.She made an appontment with me in Sangzhong;She will meet me in Shanggong;She will accompany me to Qishang.

chinese: 爰采麥矣、沬之北矣。云誰之思、美孟弋矣。期我乎桑中、要我乎上宮、送我乎淇之上矣 。
english: I am going to gather the wheat,In the north of Mei.But of whom are my thoughts?Of that beauty, the eldest of the Yi.She made an appontment with me in Sangzhong;She will meet me in Shanggong;She will accompany me to Qishang.

chinese: 爰采葑矣、沬之東矣。云誰之思、美孟庸矣。期我乎桑中、要我乎上宮、送我乎淇之上矣。
english: I am going to gather the mustard plant,,In the east of Mei.But of whom are my thoughts?Of that beauty, the eldest of the Yong.She made an appontment with me in Sangzhong;She will meet me in Shanggong;She will accompany me to Qishang.
